settings.title: Instant Power Burst
settings.description: With a peak motor power of 1100W, it delivers strong bursts of energy instantly, effortlessly tackling steep hills and turning sprints into a riding pleasure.

settings.title: Expand Your Range
settings.description:
The 940Wh battery offers a range of up to 80 miles.

Equipped with a built-in BMS (Battery Management System) chip, it ensures stable power output, guaranteeing safe arrivals every time while extending battery life.

settings.title: Ride with Your Rhythm
settings.description:
The torque sensor monitors the force and cadence of each pedal stroke in real time, instantly adjusting motor output to deliver precise power.

It offers a smooth and energy-efficient ride, making every ride something to look forward to.

settings.title: Instant Braking
settings.description:
The hydraulic braking system delivers an instant braking response.

Whether descending rapidly or navigating through traffic, it quickly responds to your brake commands to enhance riding safety.

settings.title: Conquer Bumps
settings.description:
The 110mm long-travel suspension front fork effectively absorbs bumps, maintaining steady control while reducing the impact of rocks, potholes, and steep slopes.

Handle rough terrain with confidence.

settings.title: Sunlight fuels your journey.
settings.description:
World’s first 1.6kg inverter with integrated 230W solar charging.

A mobile power station, powered by sunlight.

Powers 95% of your travel appliances.

Freedom rises with the sun.

Bring your lifestyle and rhythm with you.

Ride to the end of the horizon.

settings.title: Adjustable Stem
settings.description:
A key to unlocking comfort—it helps you find the riding position that suits you best.

Whether commuting in the city or riding outdoors, adjust it freely to match your habits and preferences.

settings.title: Ergonomic Grips
settings.description:
Designed for comfort, with pressure-relieving “bubble zones” in key areas that support your wrists and help prevent tendon strain.

Keeps your hands naturally relaxed and reduces fatigue on long rides.

settings.title: Thickened Comfortable Seat
settings.description: Made with high-resilience padding and a thickened design, it provides comfortable support and effectively absorbs shocks from rough terrain, making it ideal for long-distance rides.

settings.title: Wooden Rear Rack
settings.description:
Crafted from natural solid wood with unique grain patterns.

Each detail reveals a classic, timeless aesthetic, offering you a more elegant way to travel.

settings.title: Adjustable Seatpost
settings.description:
Height shifts with a tap. Comfort, fully in your control.

Freedom that answers to no terrain.

settings.title: Shimano 7-Speed Gear System
settings.description:
This gear allows for smooth shifting on city roads, hills, or trails.

It allows for effortless, efficient riding while maintaining a natural rhythm and reducing battery consumption.

settings.title: Color LED Multifunction Display
settings.description: Riding data is clear at a glance—ready to go, anytime, whether early morning or late at night.

settings.content: "This is an area where I think Mokwheel has set the Basalt up for some success - it's an e-bike that I think of as an off-roader first, whereas others I think of as for paved trails that I could do light offroading with."

The Mokwheel Basalt has impressed us with a powerful drive unit and a large battery that offers plenty of range. The Power Inverter option is very cool and something we haven’t seen before with other bikes.

The Mokwheel Basalt sets a new standard, exceeding expectations and offering a truly compelling package. With its potent rear hub motor and torque sensing pedal-assist system, it delivers the high-performance experience expected of a top-tier electric bike. Whether tackling hills or navigating urban roads, it makes for a dependable ride.

"The fat tire Mokwheel Basalt is not your average ebike; it’s a step towards a self-sustaining ride. As a part of Mokwheel’s “power station” ebikes, the Basalt allows solar charging and utilizes the bike’s battery as a portable power bank. "

"The best part about Mokwheel is their soft seating with extra cushioning which helps the bum stay on the seat during a long ride which is the case most of the time with its range of 80Miles. The bike does weigh a bit so it is more suitable for people with a larger build, anywhere from 5'6" - 6'8"."

"The size and up-right position take the Mokwheel Basalt Electric Bicycle out of the mountain bike sphere. From uneven pavement to muddy gravel roads, However the bike is confidence inspiring anywhere it goes."
"Mokwheel strives to reach the hearts of consumers by offering exceptional products and services with honesty and transparency."

Mokwheel is known for their high-quality design, rugged frames, and powerful electric motors, making their bikes perfect for those who crave both adventure and performance. If you’re on the lookout for anelectric mountain bike deal, Mokwheel’s collection will exceed your expectations.

settings.title: Experience the Ride
settings.content: Be part of Mokwheel, and help us deliver the spirit of free riding to every street, every city.

settings.title: Partner with Mokwheel
settings.content: No amount of data beats a real ride. At our stores, you can feel the build, sense the power. Two legs. One bike. One short ride.

settings.title: Excellence in Care
settings.content: Our dealers are trained experts who can help by understanding your needs and guide you towards the perfect ebike along with answering any questions you may have.

settings.faqs_question: What is an all-terrain fat tire electric bike?
settings.faqs_answer: An all-terrain fat tire electric bike is an e-bike equipped with extra-wide tires—usually between 3.8 to 4.8 inches—and a powerful motor system, built to handle various terrains such as sand, snow, mud, mountain trails, and city roads. The fat tires offer superior traction and shock absorption for a smoother, more stable ride. Combined with electric assist, it allows riders to conquer hills, rough surfaces, and unpredictable conditions with ease—making it a truly versatile bike for both urban and off-road adventures.

settings.faqs_question: Which users are suitable for Basalt series electric bicycles?
settings.faqs_answer: The Basalt series is designed for riders who pursue all-terrain adaptability and strong performance. Whether it is daily commuting, rural riding, or complex terrain such as sand, snow, and forest roads, it can easily cope with it.

settings.faqs_question: Is Basalt suitable for urban commuting?
settings.faqs_answer: Although Basalt is an all-terrain model, its power output is smooth, hydraulic disc brakes and sensors can be switched to cadence sensors, making it very comfortable and stable to ride on urban roads.

settings.faqs_question: What is the difference between Basalt ST and Basalt?
settings.faqs_answer: Basalt ST (Step-Thru) is a low-step design, suitable for users with shorter height or wearing skirts, especially popular among women; Basalt is a standard-step design, suitable for more intense terrain challenges.

settings.faqs_question: Is a fat bike hard to ride? Is it bumpy? Is it safe to ride in the rain?
settings.faqs_answer: The Basalt series uses a torque sensor, which makes it easy to start riding, and it is stable and labor-saving even in off-road conditions. The 4.0-inch fat tires and 110mm front fork shock absorbers effectively buffer bumps and make riding more stable and comfortable. Don't worry about rainy days. The hydraulic disc brakes ensure more powerful braking on wet ground, and the high-grip tires make riding safe and reliable.

settings.faqs_question: Do I need to install it myself?
settings.faqs_answer: The important parts are pre-installed when the vehicle leaves the factory. You only need to install the front wheel, handlebars, pedals and other parts according to the instructions and videos. You can also get help by contacting our after-sales team or offline stores.

settings.title: Took it for a fast-paced gravel ride today, and it was incredible. The motor powered me through, and the suspension kept the ride smooth even at high speeds.
Its fast and the quality from parts to body frame are a top notch! Customer service is also a plus to me. Thanks guys!
The ideal bike for family rides and exploring nature. It’s comfortable for all ages and easy for everyone to ride.
Love the bike, great range and the motor really is just what I need, get a great workout but motor is great when I hit a steep hill or strong headwind very pleased with the bike. Highly recommend
Took it through some gravel trails today, and it was fantastic. The motor powered me through, and the suspension kept the ride smooth.
Took it up a steep hill today, and the motor powered me through with ease. The suspension kept everything smooth, and I never lost control.
